item.description:

item.title: Mentioned by NorthumberlandView.ca
item.description:
Thomas Mulcair's Year in Review
NDP MP Lise St-Denis, a supporter of Thomas Mulcair during his leadership campaign, defected to the Liberal Party. NDP MP Bruce Hyer quit the NDP Caucus as a result of Thomas Mulcair's continued attack on law-abiding hunters and rural Canada.
